Hi there!

I seek to work with you to achieve greater efficiencies in your business. I am a full stack software developer of web and mobile applications. You will also benefit from my over 10 years working experience in roles as diverse as project management, financial analysis & reporting, deployment of enterprise resource planning systems and training for a variety of organizations in the public & private sectors.

You can access my brief resume here or my detailed resume here.

Full Stack Software Developer

Freelance Web Development

Developed the SecureWatch Web & Mobile application, which is cloud based software that focuses on providing Security service providers, comprehensive feedback on their standing guard operations.
With the SecureWatch application, the security company achieves efficiencies around guarding operations while at the same time gaining substantial cost reduction on guard supervision of up to 40%.

SOX Compliance Manager

Ericsson

Was retained by Ericsson Kenya Ltd over a period of 5 months to work within the Operational Excellence department and charged with driving SOX compliancy within the Sub Saharan Africa region (RSSA) for the organization.
The purpose of the role included:
• To drive, monitor, and support SOX compliance within the region, including hosted units within the region, e.g. Company Control Hubs, Business Unit (BU), or Shared Services Centre (SSC).
• To support local and regional management, including management of hosted units in SOX compliance matters.
• To be responsible for SOX Management Independent Testing locally, according to central requirements.

Project Controller

Nokia Siemens Networks

In my role as Project Controller for the Nairobi office, I was part of a team that was responsible for:
• Reporting, controlling and planning of all project related financials (across Business Lines & Business Units),
• Managing risks and ensuring SOX compliance for the projects,
• Ensuring project compliance with the company financial policies,
• Developing and maintaining demand planning (forecasts) for the projects,
• Managing customer claims, and;
• Using and maintaining the reporting, controlling and planning tools.
A key highlight was our team team being awarded by the organization for project financial planning accuracy and compliance with international (SOX) and organization financial policies.
